text: Vancouver Knights is one of the seven teams in Global T20 Canada series. This team represents the Canadian city of Vancouver. The team is led by West Indies cricketer Chris Gayle and coached by Donovan Miller. Vancouver in the 2018 edition took the second position in the points table, and became the champions beating West Indies B in the final. == Squad == {| class="wikitable" !
